Introduction: ^Who are you? What do you want?
^Hello, sir. I believe you are the doctor in charge of this place, is that so?

c-0: ^Well met, I indeed am in charge of this place, and, as you can imagine I am quite busy these days, so...

Questions: ^Is there anything else I can help you with?
^What can you tell me about the disease?
^I am infected by the disease. Is there anything you can do to help me?
^The factory foreman asked me to bring you supplies. Here you go, please take them.
